message.body: dang, i have to start getting ready for work in like 10 minutes
i can watch if you stream during then
if you stream saturday, i will be able to watch
also ngl, i started playing k3 again cause of you
started fresh, but ive played so many times before
FatYoshi fat yoshi will rise today
im already almost done with stage 4 with almost every crystal/achievements
i skipped guy tower, tempest, rng crystal
havent watched past stage 1 og k3+
thats stuff for the young people
i wont lie i had my fangame midlife crisis but now that i have no time in my life, im good again
its time for your 2nd fangame midlife crisis
what is up you absolute legends
i have been retiring from making fangames for the last 7 years
ever time i think i'm out, they pull me back in
i dont think i want to clear anything super hard for the sake of it anymore tho. i rather play shit i have fun with now
doesnt matter if easy or hard or goodf or shit
ye but when i had that it made playing miserable so id rather not
if you were to ever do a 100% or true end run would you do 2.0 or 1.5?
just get a quick win, no influka or cyber bullshit today
not comparing is another skill that is unatainable lmao
good that we got the guy timesave now
its the same as with working on any project tbh
beyond not comparing yourself to others, just having fun with the thing you're doing in the moment
and knowing that you'll be done when you're done
yuh i mean thats what i said too, im jsut playing what im feeling like now
a change of perspective. like seeing something that feels like a wall as a hurdle instead
i had one of those moments recently
bow down to the president of the united states
i would rather not do that synthas
i am a propoent of eye for an eye
thats way too much, i think a stern talking too would be alright
i think my reaction of "?" was enought when reading what he said
I was just looking at the Steven Universe episode list and you just started mentioning this shit again.
why is there some loudass music playing
OH someone is calling me on Discord
stage 1 song is making me feel kinda jolly
thatd be one hell of a party
thtas why hes the jummy hunter
holy shit Lifted... Long time no see, you got GOOD
there's like one sm64 runner that does it currently
a lot of golds this run already
and he has other times baked into his splits
i love me some nutty gameplay
i recently watched the wr again, theres actually a lot of time to be saved before stage 5
payment is such a good patience check
it never pays to be fast
its like driving over the speed limit
yeah, i usually just shoot them in the kneecaps
shine bright is basically an rng check
you got 2 9‚Äôs in a row, died to the second one and then the next attempt first dice roll was a 9
you just have to have one of those mice where you can unlock the scroll wheel
and then spin it insanely fast
whenever i see justice my brain goes "ah almost at the end of stage 3"
but there's still so much left
it just has finality aura i guess
i gamble my left kidney on the plane
i'll donate it to the nearest homeless shelter
the yummer gang found the tweet
i have no idea where we're at
i gtg, good luck on the rest of the run and future runs if you do any more
B E N Z E N
the b2b golds in hades and dotkid was pretty epic though
Sunspike is just inconsistent i hate it
wow there were 0 bullets on that final lmao
oh has that always been a thing
out of curiosity, has deathless k3 been done by community?
I don't think deathless stage 2 has been done even, so no
that was a decent amount of slow bulets
I think i've heard someone did stage 1, that's already pretty tough
yeah it's not really that it's unfair but unlike other platformers you don't really have normalized setups/movements to make stuff as consistent
ah frame perfect stuff, achiles heel for hitless/deathless runs
even just all main bosses deathless would be insanely difficult
that was 1 kunai away from being a huge disaster holy
I'm back from watching One Punch Man
Damn thanks adam i heard cyan
Adam to the rescue as always
You said "is that cyan", so I said blue, then you worked it out after I think
Welo isn't the latest season really bad?
Everyone says that but idk why people say that.
does it have hype moments and aura?
you cant have hype moments and aura with 0 animation
I wish I could watch more but I gotta wait for Echo every time and he only ever watches like 2 episodes.
they were clearly rushed to get this out as soon as possible
it probably is just a mistake that one
wouldnt be surprising if they had less than an year to put it together
Crazy how every time I see K3 Stage 5 platforming it looks way easier than the last time I looked at it.
nah, I mean like just based on the platforming itself
shit like jump diamonds were so scary before and they are like pretty alright now
I feel like Lifted's needle playstyle makes this look easier
i prefer lifteds needle playstyle from about 8 years ago honestly
they should add ice physics to doruppi
and make you slide on your own when the screen tilts
idk what this game is but seems cool
getting added to Spongebob is crazier
That red cherry at the end BRO
wait wtf ive never seen that skip
@RibJegres_ def seems fun, i found this channel/game randomly and I like both lol
They should add more Rukito screens
Like 5 seems way more like a Rukito amount
the k3 hidden rukito update that automatically adds 5 more screens permanently after a certain date
will you dip after this so that you don't spoil yourself on the next part? @Welowas
i'm surprised you're still unspoiled on that
i hope evil lifted wont do this run backwards to invalidate it
I can't believe how much easier this looks when watching Lifted
omg what did you just do lmfao
dont think of anything other than the game
you got this man dont stress
must be pretty wild seeing k3 for the first time on world record pace
dont stress it theres no rush
yooure doing great. keep at it
I'm telling you, you are gonna chill epic style
Don't give up, you can do it!
I don't think I've seen that attack give RNG that bad
Literally all of them were aimed
dude its okay sometimes luck is not with us
Naughty little run either way bro
Yo i'm awake for a run! Banger!
this just proves you have the consistency to perform an even better run, regardless of what happens
the rng since influka has been straight ass
one of the greatest runs ive ever seen regardless of how it ends
It may not be WR but it was definitely the best run ever
I think you can sub 2 if you keep at it
it woulda been such a low 2 as well
grinding this speedrun must be so stamina consuming
2nd place now, WR next run then
close it out and run it back
Hit the instant runback for an even better run
dont apologize man that was one hell of a run
that shit was only dodgeable with some super zoomed out vision
Man, I was so certain that today would be the run.
I just has a feeling before you started
end of influka was nasty aswell
you be proud of that run bro, it was amazing to watch
"im gonna lose today lol i'll try tho"
guess you were right but not in the anyone could have expected
at the end of the day we kill welo
Now that you know how it feels, you know how to handle that feeling next time.
lots of deaths near long boss ending, 254 making sense
hades was good and you can rack up a bunch of deaths there
i was unsure if last rune was 3xx or 2xx
